InitialFeedbackHistory: 07/01/2025 Ethics/Personal data: do the recorded and televised speeches and interviews contain personal data (any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person)? [REDACTED] your departure from KU [REDACTED] your OneDrive account will be closed, resulting in the loss of any data stored there. [REDACTED] avoid data loss, ensure that you transfer your data to an alternative storage solution before leaving.
